notes: Well-maintained apartment with modern wood paneling, built-in cabinetry, recessed lighting, and clean tile floors. The living room has a balcony with sliding glass doors providing natural light. The glass coffee table has sharp corners which could pose a baby safety concern, and the balcony access would need childproofing. The apartment appears clean and spacious at 23 ping, with a separate dining area and at least one additional room with hardwood floors suitable as a nursery.
